script:
import sys
from awsglue.transforms import *
from awsglue.utils import getResolvedOptions
from pyspark.context import SparkContext
from awsglue.context import GlueContext
from awsglue.job import Job

args = getResolvedOptions(sys.argv, ['JOB_NAME'])

sc = SparkContext()
glueContext = GlueContext(sc)
spark = glueContext.spark_session

job = Job(glueContext)
job.init(args['JOB_NAME'], args)

source_path = 's3://edb011glassdoor/Data/Bancos/EnquadramentoInicia_v2.tsv'

df_target_table = (spark.read.format("csv")
                   .option("header", "true")
                   .option("sep", "\t") 
                   .option("encoding", "ISO-8859-1")
                   .load(source_path))

rds_url = "jdbc:mysql://glassdoor-db.cluster-chklsxhwihzi.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com:3306/glassdoor-db"
rds_properties = {
    "user": "admin",
    "password": "#EDCvfr45tgb",
    "driver": "com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver"
}

df_target_table.write.jdbc(url=rds_url, table="banks_raw", mode="overwrite", properties=rds_properties)

job.commit()
